overview: "A&E Live by Request" October 1, 1998 at Sony Music Studios New York, NY  Setlist:  1) Sussudio 2) You Can't Hurry Love 3) Against All Odds 4) True Colors 5) Easy Lover 6) In The Air Tonight 7) Don't Lose My Number 8) Another Day In Paradise (with David Crosby) 9) I Can't Dance 10) Groovy Kind of Love 11) Something Happened on the Way to Heaven 12) Take Me Home 13) Wear My Hat
title: Phil Collins - Live by Request
